CustomField.inlineHelpText: If per user mode is enabled a mapping needs to exist where each User Id is mapped to the external identifier. Use the "Auth Provider Util" App to create these mappings. If this is switched on the JWT Subject field will be populated based on the user mapping. This option requires the "Lightweight - Auth Provider Util v2" (04t4K000002Jv1tQAC) package to be installed.
CustomField.label: Enable Per User Mode
